org.eclipse.californium.core

Class CoapObserveRelation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.californium.core.CoapObserveRelation

  • public class CoapObserveRelation
extends Object
    A CoapObserveRelation is a client-side control handle. It represents a CoAP observe relation between a CoAP client and a resource on a server. CoapObserveRelation provides a simple API to check whether a relation has successfully established and to cancel or refresh the relation.

      Constructs a new CoapObserveRelation with the specified request.

      Proactive Observe cancellation: Cancel the observe relation by sending a GET with Observe=1.
      void reactiveCancel()
      Reactive Observe cancellation: Cancel the observe relation by forgetting, which will trigger a RST.

    • Method Detail

      • reregister

        public boolean reregister()
        Refreshes the Observe relationship with a new GET request with same token and options. The method also resets the notification orderer, since the server might have rebooted and started the observe sequence number from the beginning.
        Returns:
        true, if reregister request is sent, false, otherwise.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the request is already canceled or the CoAP server is not supported.

      • proactiveCancel

        public void proactiveCancel()
        Proactive Observe cancellation: Cancel the observe relation by sending a GET with Observe=1.

      • reactiveCancel

        public void reactiveCancel()
        Reactive Observe cancellation: Cancel the observe relation by forgetting, which will trigger a RST. For TCP, {proactiveCancel() will be executed.

      • isCanceled

        public boolean isCanceled()
        Checks if the relation has been canceled.
        Returns:
        true, if the relation has been canceled

      • getCurrent

        public CoapResponse getCurrent()
        Gets the current notification or null if none has arrived yet.
        Returns:
        the current notification

      • setCanceled

        protected void setCanceled(boolean canceled)
        Marks this relation as canceled.
        Parameters:
        canceled - true if this relation has been canceled

      • setNotificationListener

        public void setNotificationListener(NotificationListener listener)

      • onResponse

        protected boolean onResponse(CoapResponse response)
        Sets the current response or notification. Use orderer to filter deprecated responses.
        Parameters:
        response - the response or notification
        Returns:
        true, response is accepted by orderer, false otherwise.
